EmailTemplate.subject: Change Management Certification Programme | Prework and Programme Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We look forward to your participation in {!Training_Event}
Programme Dates: {!Training_Event__c.Start_Date__c} - {!Training_Event__c.End_Date__c} at {!Training_Event__c.Location__c}
Our goal is to equip you with knowledge, skills, and tools to drive successful change.
PREPARING FOR YOUR programme Prework Requirements
To maximize your in-programme learning experience, you will need to complete a number of prework tasks. You should allow 2 hours to complete as it is a critical component to support your learning experience.
Set-up your Prosci Portal Access and Prework tasks
You will receive an email shortly from portal@prosci.com with a link to your programme prework in the Prosci Portal as well as access to additional content, resources and tools to support your in-programme learning.
Once in the Prosci portal, click the “Prework” tile. You should see a drop-down menu that says “Prework Tasks”. Prework is due 4 business days before your programme to allow your instructor time to review.
Schedule
The schedule below indicates the time you will be required to attend. Please note, there will be 8 hours of dedicated class time on Day 1 and Day 2 and 7 hours on Day 3, all with frequent breaks throughout the session. Please estimate roughly 1 hour of additional self-study on Day 1 and 2.
Course Timings prompt start at local time zone: Europe/London
{!Training_Event__c.Program_Schedule__c}
Please be aware that you may not become certified if any training is missed.
Your Instructor will factor in breaks in around the flow of training each day.
What You Need for Success as an In-Person Learner
Your learning experience is very important to us. The following will greatly enhance your experience and success:
IT requirements - Laptop or desktop computer with Microsoft Office 2007 or newer. Mac users, please use Microsoft Office for Mac to ensure tool compatibility.
If you have any questions about preparing for your programme, please don’t hesitate to contact us at training.europe@prosci.com.
Best regards,
{!Training_Event__c.OwnerFullName}
Training Coordinator
